20101228090441.000|20101228090443.000|CC1|   THESE SYMPTOMS OR BEHAVIORS, 
20101228090443.000|20101228090443.000|CC1|   STOP TAKING CHANTIX AND CALL 
20101228090443.000|20101228090445.000|CC1|     YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY.    
20101228090445.000|20101228090445.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20101228090445.000|20101228090447.000|CC1| ABOUT ANY HISTORY OF DEPRESSION
20101228090447.000|20101228090447.000|CC1|             OR OTHER           
20101228090447.000|20101228090448.000|CC1|     MENTAL HEALTH PROBLEMS,    
20101228090448.000|20101228090448.000|CC1|      WHICH COULD GET WORSE     
20101228090448.000|20101228090450.000|CC1|      WHILE TAKING CHANTIX.     
20101228090450.000|20101228090450.000|CC1| IF YOU DEVELOP SERIOUS ALLERGIC
20101228090450.000|20101228090453.000|CC1|        OR SKIN REACTIONS,      
20101228090453.000|20101228090453.000|CC1|       STOP TAKING CHANTIX      
20101228090453.000|20101228090455.000|CC1|  AND SEE YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY
20101228090455.000|20101228090455.000|CC1|         AS SOME OF THESE       
20101228090455.000|20101228090457.000|CC1|     CAN BE LIFE-THREATENING.   
20101228090457.000|20101228090457.000|CC1|      DON'T TAKE CHANTIX IF     
20101228090457.000|20101228090459.000|CC1|  YOU'VE HAD A SERIOUS ALLERGIC 
20101228090459.000|20101228090500.000|CC1|     OR SKIN REACTION TO IT.    
20101228090500.000|20101228090500.000|CC1|     DOSING MAY BE DIFFERENT    
20101228090500.000|20101228090502.000|CC1|   IF YOU HAVE KIDNEY PROBLEMS. 
20101228090502.000|20101228090502.000|CC1|          UNTIL YOU KNOW        
20101228090502.000|20101228090504.000|CC1|     HOW CHANTIX AFFECTS YOU,   
20101228090504.000|20101228090504.000|CC1|     USE CAUTION WHEN DRIVING   
20101228090504.000|20101228090506.000|CC1|     OR OPERATING MACHINERY.    
20101228090506.000|20101228090506.000|CC1|       COMMON SIDE EFFECTS      
20101228090506.000|20101228090508.000|CC1|         INCLUDE NAUSEA,        
20101228090508.000|20101228090508.000|CC1|         TROUBLE SLEEPING
